result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ عَمِلُواْ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِجَهَٰلَةٖ ثُمَّ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُوٓاْ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
result.translation: 119.Nabii Mucammadow tohuk lakal diggah ku Rabbi iggimat umaane abeeh tohuk lakal woo uma taamoomik Yallal yotoobeeh isi taamoomi yessemcqqc marah diggah ku Rabbi too toobah lakal dambi cabti li xuwaw lí kinni.
